org.apache.spark.io

Class LZ4CompressionCodec

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.io.LZ4CompressionCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompressionCodec

    public class LZ4CompressionCodec
extends Object
implements CompressionCodec
    :: DeveloperApi :: LZ4 implementation of CompressionCodec. Block size can be configured by spark.io.compression.lz4.block.size.

    Note: The wire protocol for this codec is not guaranteed to be compatible across versions of Spark. This is intended for use as an internal compression utility within a single Spark application.
